8.11 DUIM-Gadgets Module

gadget-label-setter

Generic function

Summary

Sets the label for the specified gadget.

Signature

gadget-label-setter label gadget => label

Arguments

label
An instance of type type-union(<string>, <image>).

gadget
An instance of type <gadget>.

Values

label
An instance of type type-union(<string>, <image>).

Library

duim-gadgets

Module

duim-gadgets

Description

Sets the label for gadget to label. The label must be #f, a string, or an instance of <image>. Changing the label of a gadget may result in invoking the layout protocol on the gadget and its ancestor sheets, if the new label occupies a different amount of space than the old label.

Example

*gadget* := contain(make(<button>, label: "Hello"));
gadget-label(*gadget*) := "Hello world";

See also

gadget-label, page 569

gadget-label-key, page 570

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
